name: windmill
description: Windmill is an open-source, self-hostable developer platform that turns scripts into production-grade workflows, APIs, and internal apps. It supports multiple languages, scheduling, webhooks, auto-generated UIs, and offers commercial cloud hosting.
features: Script execution: Run scripts in Python, TypeScript, Go, Bash, or SQL as workflows or APIs instantly.
Workflow builder: Create complex automation workflows with a visual flow editor and conditional logic.
Auto-generated UIs: Automatically generate web interfaces for scripts with form inputs and result displays.
Scheduling: Set up cron-based schedules to run scripts and workflows at specific times or intervals.
Webhook triggers: Expose scripts as HTTP endpoints that can be called from external systems.
Secret management: Store API keys, passwords, and credentials securely with encrypted secret storage.
Version control: Track script changes with Git integration for collaboration and rollback capability.
Dependency management: Automatically handle package dependencies for Python, npm, and other ecosystems.
Execution logs: View detailed logs of all script runs with inputs, outputs, and error messages.
Resource management: Define reusable resources like database connections or API clients across scripts.
Permission system: Control access to scripts, workflows, and resources with role-based permissions.
Monitoring dashboard: Track script execution metrics, success rates, and performance in real-time.
